contentrichtext.text: This is a list of [[List of U.S. state prisons|state prisons]] in [[Utah]]. It does not include [[List of U.S. federal prisons|federal prisons]] or county jails located in the state of Utah. {{Expand list|date=February 2011}} * [[Central Utah Correctional Facility]] * [[Sugar House Prison (Utah)|Sugar House Prison]], closed 1951 * [[Utah State Prison]] ==See also== *[[List of United States state prisons]] ==External links== *[http://www.cr.ex.state.ut.us/ Utah Department of Corrections] [[Category:Prisons in Utah| ]] [[Category:Lists of United States state prisons|Utah]] [[Category:Utah-related lists|Prisons]] {{utah-struct-stub}} {{US-prison-stub}}
